Dating: AMENHOTEP III/AMENOPHIS III/NEBMAATRE (not after); NEW KINGDOM; NEW KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Shabti of the lector-priest Kaheri
Description: The shabti is mummiform, wearing a plain wig. The arms are crossed right over left. On the fists, that hold no implements, the sleeves are indicated. The features of the shabti are executed in fine detail. The eyes are painted in black. The text is inscribed in horizontal lines running round the body.
